snippet.title: Escape From Sandhill Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to a nightmare where the key to your survival lies in the darkness. You wake up unconscious, the eerie silence interrupted only by the shrieks of distant alarms. Armed only with a flashlight, you must navigate dark corridors filled with remnants of a sinister past.

Shadows subjected to horrific experiments seek revenge. Solve intricate puzzles and uncover secrets that could save you or seal your fate.

Can you escape Sandhill?

Order Game
Itch.oi - https://kuzeykirklar.itch.io/escape-from-sandhill
